name: inexpensively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not cost a lot of money: We were able to access the data easily and inexpensively. It is possible to cook inexpensively and healthily if you know what you are doing.
More examplesFewer examplesI was able to pick up what I needed very inexpensively at the local market.We managed to build up the business quite inexpensively once we set up our website.We want to import our gas and electricity as inexpensively as possible.
